devdoc.details: This implementation is a minimal version inspired by 0age's implementation: https://github.com/dharma-eng/dharma-smart-wallet/blob/master/contracts/upgradeability/DharmaUpgradeBeaconController.sol

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._beacon: Address of the UpgradeBeacon which will be updated
params._implementation: Address of the Implementation contract to upgrade the Beacon to

devdoc.title: UpgradeBeaconController

upgrade(address,address).notice: Modify the implementation stored in the UpgradeBeacon, which will upgrade the implementation used by all Proxy contracts using that UpgradeBeacon

userdoc.notice: Set as the controller of UpgradeBeacon contract(s), capable of changing their stored implementation address.
